channel.title: How to make Chlorine Bomb!
channel.description:
[glow=red,2,300]IMPORTANT!! - I'm not responsible for any trouble you will most likely get in if you throw one of these at you're friend. Do not throw them at another human being. It can blind them or cause other issues. Use on objects like cars, houses, mailboxes, etc.[/glow]
[u]Requirements[/u]: -Chlorine. If you don't have a pool, this might be difficult to obtain. -Rubbing alchohol -A water bottle with cap. -Hammer
[u]Steps[/u]: -First, take a tab of chlorine, and crush it up with a hammer. When you're done, it should be almost powder like. [b]Have your hands as dry as possible. If wet chlorine touches your clothes, it will bleach out the color.[/b]
-Secondly, put the crushed chlorine into the water bottle. [b]Do Not Loose the Cap![/b]
-Lastly, get your rubbing alchohol out, and slowly pour it into the bottle. Make sure you pour a small amount. The bottle will immediatly start to fizz. As fast as you can, put the cap back onto the bottle. [b]If you take too long, the bomb can explode in you're hand. And can get into your eyes.[/b] Shake it up a bit, and throw it at your target, and get ready for explosion!!! -----
May sound a bit dangerous, but it is only if you don't properly follow this tutorial. If you do it right, it's extremely fun. ----- Note: I don't know if someone made a topic like this already. I hope not. I got the idea of this topic from Ghostboy195's toturial on how to make a shaving cream bomb. In my opinion, I think chlorine bombs are alot better, they're loud, messier, and more realistic. ----- [b]ENJOY! IF YOU DON'T FEEL COMFORTABLE DOING THIS, YOU PROBALLY SHOULDN'T. STICK WITH THE SAFER SHAVING CREAM BOMB. I DID THIS LIKE 1 MILLION TIMES, AND NEVER HAD A ACCIDENT. IF YOU'RE FEELING CONFINDENT, TRY IT![/b] ;)

item.title: How to make Chlorine Bomb!
item.dc:creator: @PussyCrunch PussyCrunch
item.description:
@PussyCrunch wrote:

[glow=red,2,300]IMPORTANT!! - I’m not responsible for any trouble you will most likely get in if you throw one of these at you’re friend. Do not throw them at another human being. It can blind them or cause other issues. Use on objects like cars, houses, mailboxes, etc.[/glow]

Requirements:
-Chlorine. If you don’t have a pool, this might be difficult to obtain.
-Rubbing alchohol
-A water bottle with cap.
-Hammer

Steps:
-First, take a tab of chlorine, and crush it up with a hammer. When you’re done, it should be almost powder like. Have your hands as dry as possible. If wet chlorine touches your clothes, it will bleach out the color.

-Secondly, put the crushed chlorine into the water bottle. Do Not Loose the Cap!

-Lastly, get your rubbing alchohol out, and slowly pour it into the bottle. Make sure you pour a small amount. The bottle will immediatly start to fizz. As fast as you can, put the cap back onto the bottle. If you take too long, the bomb can explode in you’re hand. And can get into your eyes. Shake it up a bit, and throw it at your target, and get ready for explosion!!!

May sound a bit dangerous, but it is only if you don’t properly follow this tutorial. If you do it right, it’s extremely fun.

Note: I don’t know if someone made a topic like this already. I hope not. I got the idea of this topic from Ghostboy195’s toturial on how to make a shaving cream bomb. In my opinion, I think chlorine bombs are alot better, they’re loud, messier, and more realistic.

ENJOY! IF YOU DON’T FEEL COMFORTABLE DOING THIS, YOU PROBALLY SHOULDN’T. STICK WITH THE SAFER SHAVING CREAM BOMB. I DID THIS LIKE 1 MILLION TIMES, AND NEVER HAD A ACCIDENT. IF YOU’RE FEELING CONFINDENT, TRY IT!

Read full topic
